text.content:
Numbing Blow

Normal damage. Crit Effect: The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Clumsy]{Clumsy 1} for 1 minute and must succeed at a @Check[type:reflex] or drop one item it holds at random.

Bludgeoning

Sucking chest Wound

The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Fatigued].

Piercing

Overhand Chop

Crit Effect: 1d8 persistent bleed damage.

Slashing

Knockback

Push the target up to 10 feet.

Bomb or Spell
